item.description:
Hi folks~

A few of us were discussing our shared love for this magical french movie. Amelie is my favorite movie - it is artfully filmed, the soundtrack is beautiful, the storyline is sweet and its concept original. Since some people had expressed interest in watching the film anyhow, I figured - hey, why not make a meetup out of it?

Whether you already love the film or you've never seen it before, you're welcome to come watch at my apt- hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: must sign up for the meetup to find out!

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Amelie!
